option.mouserate-framerate.ticks_until_f: Ticks occur at a rate of ~20 per second
option.mouserate-framerate.use_mouse_act: Resets the tick timer upon moving your mouse within the screen
option.mouserate-framerate.use_movement_: Resets the tick timer upon *voluntarily* moving your character along the X,Y, and Z axis
option.mouserate-framerate.use_hurt_acti: Resets the tick timer upon being hurt
option.mouserate-framerate.use_hand_swin: Resets the tick timer upon most item use and hand-swing actions
